title.rendered: Plan get-togethers with your girls at  the Esplanade’s Pink Afternoon Tea

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Having a girl’s day has never been more fun! In October paint your encounters pink with the Esplanade’s unmissable chic ritual. Support the initiative with a humanitarian message, throw together a pink outfit, and bring a friend to the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar. Use your influence on social media,  encourage others to get an early screening, and indulge in the sweetest pink delights!

In what is becoming tradition, in cooperation with the non-profit association P.I.N.K. life, the iconic Esplanade Hotel marks the Pink Ribbon Month global initiative with a humanitarian story you, too, can take part in. Namely, the entire month of October at the Esplanade Hotel is dedicated to raising awareness of the importance of breast cancer prevention and the fight against this vicious disease, which is why the popular Afternoon Tea has been donned in pink. The Esplanade’s multiple award-winning Executive Chef Ana Grgić Tomić and pastry chef Mirjana Špoljar have joined their female forces and for this occasion designed tempting snacks and pink desserts that are conveniently served on a tiered stand with premium Ronnefeldt tea in a teapot. From each amount, the hotel will set aside 10%, and the money will be donated at the end of the month to the association.  Additionally, to announce this event and its support for the global initiative, the façade of the Esplanade Hotel will be illuminated in pink shades from 4th – 8th October.  

Dare to participate in the pink fight

Have you always wanted to start an initiative, but didn’t know how? Don’t worry, you can be part of this pink story as well!  From 2nd to 31st October, wear pink, take a female friend or a loved one to the chic environment of the Esplanade Lounge & Cocktail Bar or the Oleander Terrace and do the right thing – encourage yourself, your mother, girlfriend, female colleague, but also all women, to think about the most important thing – their health. At our Pink Afternoon Tea, choose a pink-hued drink and post a story or reel with tags #PinkAfternoonTea #PinkLife # PinkOctober2023 #PinkRibbon and use your influence to help raise awareness through social media. In the month when this malignant disease is most talked about, it is necessary to emphasize that breast cancer is a disease that is a reality for millions of women and their families every day. Raising awareness and focusing on prevention through self-monitoring, ultrasound, and mammography is what you can do to save your life or someone else’s.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

A symphony of pink snacks and treats

This October, delicious pink-edition snacks await you, such as a crispy basket filled with curd and red beet mousse, kulen salami and herb croquettes, as well as marinated salmon with homemade bread with dill cream and pickled mustard in red beet. They are followed by sweet snacks in the form of ruby cubes with mascarpone and raspberry cream, pink macarons with white chocolate cream and rose water, and red velvet cake with ricotta and hibiscus cream, as well as rosehip, vanilla, and white chocolate panna cotta. Indulge in true delights, take a moment to spend time with your friends, and do a good deed that can save someone’s life.

Raise a toast with a pink drink

Round off this pink story with a glass of rosé sparkling wine, rosé wine, or a pink cocktail created for this occasion by our exceptional mixologist and F&B Director  Vjenceslav Madić ‘Master Kishoni’. Pink Wood, Pink Lady, Whispering Angel, Villa Sandi Prosecco Rosé, or Pink Grapefruit Soda – you are guaranteed to be delighted by the refreshing notes. Accept the challenge and become a part of this wonderful story! Don pink and make a difference! Take pride in showing that you, too, are part of this campaign, and with your activities, encourage others to join in and do the same. Support the initiative of the Esplanade Hotel and the work of the P.I.N.K. life association in a classy environment, with superb gourmet delicacies. Hurry up, as this Esplanade Hotel gourmet experience is only available during October, the Pink Ribbon Month. You can enjoy the delicious pink snacks every day from 12.30 pm – 6.30 pm at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar or on the Oleander Terrace. The limited edition Pink Afternoon Tea for two is EUR 48 (HRK 361.65), and the offer is valid from 2nd to 31st October 2023. Table reservations at phone: 01 45 666 33.

##

DOWNLOAD MATERIALS

  • Pink afternoon tea – MENU
    https://www.esplanade.hr/press/releases/Pink-October-in-Esplanade.pdf
  • PHOTOS can be downloaded here (credits to Esplanade Hotel Archive): Pink popodnevni caj 2023

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered:
Offer is available at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar from 2nd – 31st October 2023,
from 12.30 pm – 6.30 pm
